In [[Microsoft Excel]], the day 0 of the [[Epoch (reference date)#Computing|1900 date format]] is January 0, 1900.<ref name="m">{{cite web |url=http://support.microsoft.com/kb/205719 |publisher=[[Microsoft]] |title=XL2000: Early Dates on Office Spreadsheet Component Differ from Excel |accessdate=2007-12-08 |quote=In the Microsoft Office Spreadsheet Component, the value 0 evaluates to the date December 30, 1899 and the value 1 evaluates to December 31, 1899. ... In Excel, the value 0 evaluates to January 0, 1900 and the value 1 evaluates to January 1, 1900.}}</ref>
